source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a scenic, high-angle shot of a highway stretching towards a dramatic sunset. Dark, stormy blue clouds fill the upper sky, contrasting with the fiery orange and red glow on the horizon where rain can be seen falling. Cars and trucks are visible driving along the two separate roadways.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.initial_feedback: This is not a high angle but a level angle.
source_caption_data.gpt_feedback: The angle of the shot appears to be more level rather than high.
source_caption_data.final_feedback: The angle of the shot appears to be more level rather than high.

Dark, stormy blue clouds fill the upper sky, contrasting with the fiery orange and red glow on the horizon where rain can be seen falling. Cars and trucks are visible driving along the two separate roadways.
